page.title: 17FESTIVALS IN SW.BOGNOR REGIS
page.content: There are certain events that occur annually in this area.One of these is the{International Birdman Rally}which is held on the Pier every August. A prize (Â£10000 in 1984) will be awarded to the person who with his/her 'flying machine' is able to fly 50 metres after leaping from the Pier. Another event is the{Bognor Regis Festival which will be held this year from July 27th to August 11th.It starts off with a{carnival}and throughout the week there are a variety of events such as street entertainers and a sandcastle competition.The festival ends with the{Motor Gala}at West End Park. The{Bognor Regis Illumination {Fund Gala}and{Parade}is held later in August.This year a successful{Clowns' {Convention}was held at The Regis Centre and it is hoped that this will be its permanent venue.
